Value: Hey, Snow White. Are you okay?
Shall we switch? Snow White has had to carry Marian this whole time.
Thine armor is also most prodigious.
I am sure 'tis a most formidable weight to bear.
It's no picnic, that's for sure.
As I live and breathe! She is sound asleep.
Passed out is more like it.
You had nothing to do with her ending up this way.
Very well, let's say it is.
Be that as it may, we will share your burden.
Is it so difficult to comprehend?
Come on, let me carry her.
It may not seem like it, but I'm quite adept at carrying things.
When did thou develop such prowess?
Ah, I see. Thine skills must have blossomed whilst helping the others recuperate.
That too, but I've also hauled my fair share of deer...
Forget I said anything. Come on, hand her over to me.
... Very well. Be gentle with her.
Snow White carefully hands over Marian, whom she had been carrying, to Rapunzel.
Let's see... gather the arms, then lift onto the shoulders like so...
Let's get a move on, shall we?
Marian's feet drag on the ground.
Her feet are being subjected to the most unusual punishment.
So long as it doesn't slow down the pace, it should be fine.
Marian squirms frantically and Rapunzel staggers as she attempts to restrain her.
Okay, okay! I'm putting you down, just relax.
Chill out, will you? If you keep flopping around, you'll end up touching me...!
Rapunzel collapses to the ground in a heap.
Where is the Commander? I want to see the Commander!
I'm going to see him, and that's final!
I told you. He's not here.
I want to go back. I want to see the Commander.
I-I knew that! I was going to head in the opposite direction!
If you go back now, they'll have you dissected on an operating table within an hour.
But you wouldn't be the only one in danger. They would kill your precious Commander.
He will do whatever it takes to protect you.
And as punishment for turning his back on the entire Ark,
The situation truly is most unjust. A bitter pill to swallow, forsooth.
But what of the feelings of My Lord, who sent you to us?
He has put you in our care, because he himself is powerless.
Try to understand. Now is not the time to fuss.
What he needs right now is time. Time to become stronger.
What if he doesn't come back for me?
Do you really take him for the mendacious type?
No. The Commander would never lie to me.
There you have it. Hence why we're asking you to wait a little longer.
He will come back for you, and until then, we will protect you. I promise.
She seems to have calmed down.
Praise the heavens. Had she continued to be so obstreperous, our journey would have been most trying.
Should she utilize her strength fully, it would be impossible for us to stop her.
If they had taught her the way of the sword, she would have been legendary.
If I said no, it would be a lie. I've never seen someone with such physical prowess.
We all know how interested you are in... physical strength.
Oh, to be a mentor watching all the physical developments of their disciples' physiques...
Perhaps teaching the pleasures of the flesh to the most learned disciples... yes, YES!
Nowhere is safe up on the surface.
It's a place Raptures have no interest in.
until your prince charming comes back for you.
How far do we have to go?
At our current speed, it will take about a week on foot.
Oh, right. I knew that. I was just testing you.
... I assure you that I'm well aware of how many days are in a week. You don't have to test me.
What's waiting for us over there?
You'll find out when you get there.
She really is pushing her hard.
Wha... is that your real name?
Isn't that what you were about to ask me?
No... it's just that the sun is down, and...
I was told I should sleep at night.
Foregoing sleep will not pose a problem for us.
If we sleep, it will take twice as long, and as you're well aware, the surface is far from accommodating.
Snow White, we should rest a bit.
No. Unless we have no other choice, we should avoid camping outside altogether.
Now would be a good time for us to rest.
And what made you come to that conclusion?
It's all in her head. Nikkes do not experience fatigue.
You know as well as I do that's not true.
We have to maintain a steady pace the entire way through.
If one of us increases the pace too much, it'll be too much for the others.
If one side increases the pace... it'd be too much to handle...
She would beg you to stop... she'd cry that she couldn't take it anymore...
Oh yes... right there... that's it...
There's a stream nearby. We should rest here.
You mustn't underestimate the value of a good rest.
For hardy folks like us who wander the surface, we can disregard our physical conditions.
But such a thing could be dangerous for normal Nikkes.
The strain could result in a Mind Switch. You of all people should know that.
Marian only came up from the Ark today.
... Very well. I didn't take everything into consideration.
Let's stay here and rest for a bit, okay?
Um... none of you happen to have a blanket, do you?
We're camping outdoors. Sorry to break it to you, but the bare ground will have to suffice.
Just a moment. I'll try to find something for you to lie on.
I didn't ask you. Besides, you're always hungry.
Your body is telling us otherwise.
I'll chance a visit to that stream close by.
If I'm lucky, I could catch a few freshwater fish.
Hmm, these are proving tougher to catch than I anticipated.
This is a tool called a fishing rod used to catch fish in the water.
Don't be silly. Fish come from the refrigerator.
Er... there are various types of fish in the world.
Their flavor is on a whole different plane, far exceeding whatever you have had in the Ark.
So when will the fish come out?
Patience, my friend. Nothing gets accomplished by rushing.
That is how the world works. As there are happy things, so there are sad things.
How can life be full of only good things?
How were things when you were with your Commander?
and today is a sad day.
That's all there is to it.
When will the good times come back?
Let me impart upon thee the secret to living life.
Think only of the good things. Then the good times will last longer and the melancholy will quickly fade.
Should thou commence thinking only of good things now, and set your heart to creating good things,
the sadness of today will be washed away like tears in the rain.
So I should think of only the Commander?
That would be one way of doing it.
Think about the day you will be reunited.
Isn't it pretty to think so?
Let those thoughts fill you with resolve and the will to live, and things will be different.
Um... what should I call you?
Scarlet... what are the good things that you think about?
I think of cutting the Queen's throat.
I think about the beauty of nature.
How wonderful it would feel to slash the throat of the one responsible for making the world what it has become.
Gazing at its majesty provides a pleasure that never diminishes.
Hmm... I don't think I quite understand.
You don't have to. If you knew everything, what fun life would be... Ah!
There is a small burst of activity in the stream, and Scarlet's fishing rod bends.
Attached to the end of the fishing line is a fish the length of her forearm.
This is what they call a fish. How does it feel to see one in person?
... Well, thou are nothing if not brutally honest.
Is this what we're going to eat?
That's right. We can't eat it straight away, though. We'll have to cook it first.
It might be hard since it's your first time,
Scarlet and Marian come back with their arms full of fish.
Wow, those are some real whoppers. How did you manage to catch so many?
Marian caught the lion's share of them.
Should we light a small fire? Nothing so big as to draw attention to ourselves.
Scarlet can clean the fish, and I'll handle the cooking.
As for me, I'll get ready to eat.
Could you at least go wash your face first? You've got drool dripping down your chin.
Why don't you set up the jammer, then?
Rapunzel pulls out a neatly tied bundle of her hair, which she had previously removed.
You're not going to eat without me, are you?
We won't take a bite until you're back, so don't worry.
All right, I'm choosing to trust you.
Marian, you can lie down over there and rest.
Rapunzel gestures at some old blankets which have been spread out.
Are those blankets? Where did you get those?
Turns out there was a village close by.
They may not measure up to what you'd find in the Ark, but they'll be better than nothing.
Marian awkwardly plops down on the old blankets.
Rapunzel quickly sets to collecting some kindling, then ignites a bunch of dry grass with a fire starter.
The spark catches, and before long, the surroundings are illuminated by the dancing flames.
Scarlet quickly guts and scales the fish, then hands them to Rapunzel,
who skewers them on an iron rod she found lying nearby.
Rapunzel then places the impaled fish near the fire.
Hehe. I'm glad we're at least getting better at something. It's a pity there's no salt.
How are you holding up, Marian? Are you comfortable?
This will take some time to cook, so you can sleep for a bit.
I'll wake you up when it's done.
Get some rest. We'll protect you.
As soon as Rapunzel finishes speaking, Marian feels her eyelids getting heavy.
The soft blankets, the crackling of the fire, the flickering flames...
Marian quickly falls asleep without even realizing.
... How hard it must have been for her.
Fate has not been kind to her.
It will only get worse going forward.
A Heretic coming back to humanity's side.
Just saying it out loud seems outrageous.
She has a difficult life ahead of her.
What can we do for her?
We must teach her how to press on.
How to endure, even when you're alone.
We have to teach her everything we can during that time.
Dost thou believe there will be a time when she is alone?
we cannot be sure which side she will choose to stand on.
As long as Believer is present, things will not fall apart entirely, but...
That is what I believe as well.
How do you think Snow White will feel?
She's teaching her in her own way.
You don't need to worry about that.
You haven't eaten yet, have you?
No, we haven't. It still needs to cook some more.
I'm sure we could eat it now and be fine.
That's not the point. It simply wouldn't taste good.
Again, I don't see the problem.
Whoa! I've never tasted something like this before.
You can have mine as well.
What is it, Snow White? Something wrong?
... Do I have to give her mine too?
Well... we already gave her ours, so you can keep yours to yourself.
Forsooth, Marian's appetite truly is most prodigious!
Then again, this is her first time eating proper food from up on the surface. 'Tis most sensible.
Oh my gosh! This is really delicious!
Snow White gives the fish she was holding to Marian.
You're not experiencing a Mind Switch or anything like that, are you?
You're not going to eat the bones, are you?
Are the bones this hard stuff? I don't think I should eat that.
You could have had at least one, Snow White.
the sumptuous fireside banquet has been consumed in its entirety.
Marian lies down on the ground, sleeping.
Why don't we let Marian stay with us?
We are always in danger. And we don't usually move in a group like this.
I know, but we can take turns accompanying her.
Marian needs a place to stay.
She hasn't fully recovered mentally, and she needs something tangible to hold onto.
Having a single, fixed location is the best option for that.
The Ark can no longer serve that function for her. She was driven away, and there is no guarantee that she'll ever be able to go back.
Of course, Eden is also an option.
That's not a viable option, either.
You just want to take on a disciple.
It's still early. We have things to do.
I know. I know very well.
I got a bit greedy. Forgive me.
It's best to avoid places like this, where the mud is thick. It could be a swamp.
Were someone of our mass to fall into a swamp, it would be all over.
Think of it as a pit you can never get out of.
Can't you just jump out of it?
Imagine multiple hands holding you back so that you can't jump.
What would hands be doing in a pit?
I do not speak of real, literal hands...
Are you sure there are hands in there? How do they move?
There are many useful items in abandoned places like this.
No, since they don't have an owner.
Let me put it this way: if they're covered in dust or cobwebs...
You must kill a Rapture the moment you lay eyes on it.
Why do we have to kill it?
If you don't, it will kill you.
There is no "why". They just are.
When venturing off into the unknown, one's state of mind is paramount.
If you control your mind, there is nothing to fear in this world.
How do you control your mind?
If you drink alcohol, everything in the world becomes perfectly peaceful.
Sounds nice! I'd like a drink.
When you explore a village, you might find things like books.
They're big and heavy, and not easy to carry around, but...
If you take the time to read them, the way you look at the world might change.
What's a masterpiece doing in a place like this?
Will my perspective on the world change if I read this?
You bet it will! This won't just give you a new perspective, it'll open up a whole new world for you!
Don't be picky. Eat whatever you can find.
How do I distinguish what I can eat?
Is this something I can eat?
Marian points at a nearby rock.
Sure, let's give it a shot.
It's good to be adventurous and try new things.
You seem to be drinking a lot lately...
My mind's too loud. I want it to be quiet. Give me some more, please?
I tried making rice balls with sawdust and centipedes earlier,
and I have to say... I think they're my masterpiece.
I put some in your backpack, so you can have some whenever you're hungry.
looks a bit like a man playing with his...
Why didn't I think of that?
I have a feeling things are not going the way I thought...
H-how did you do that in one shot? Y-you're amazing...!
The thoroughly satisfied Rapunzel slumps to the ground.
Why are you wearing your underwear on the outside again?
You're supposed to wear your underwear under your clothing.
It doesn't affect my movement, so what does it matter?
Come to think of it, you're right. I can't refute that.
For goodness sake, try and think of something...
I'll know once I give it a try.
What kind of monster have we created?
My stomach doesn't feel so good either.
She hasn't sobered up just yet.
Frankly, it's amazing that she's even mobile.
The four Nikkes all plod along without a word.
A rather formidable one, at that.
Pray tell, why is she in such a hurry?
My orders are simple: Kill every last Rapture you see.
Thou rushed in most impetuously, but you seem to be having a hard time.
You say that, but it looks to me that you've sustained some bodily injuries.
It has been quite some time since we encountered them, and then they came out of nowhere.
Do you think there's a reason for that?
Snow White, Scarlet, and Rapunzel all stop in unison, as if on cue.
This is where you come in, Snow White.
Marian, Scarlet, and I are going to head our own way from here.
Thou dost resemble a member of the walking dead...
Are you okay with this, Snow White?
When Marian comes to her senses, she is likely to throw a fit.
We have things to do. It's not efficient for all of us to move together.
We all have our own tasks to take care of at this point.
it wouldn't be smart for all of us to know where Marian will be hiding.
Yes. It would be dangerous if our brains were scanned.
I have a rough idea of where she'll be going though.
Okay, I'll leave the rest in your capable hands, Snow White.
Ugh... my head hurts... Carry me, Commander...
Scarlet and Rapunzel both head off in opposite directions.
Snow White gazes at them for a while, then takes Marian's hand and begins to walk.
After three hours or so have passed,
a towering fortress stands before them.
You said you would be here in a week! It's been two whole weeks!
I had to throw away all the food I made. I've been keeping watch constantly to see when you were coming!
Now you show up all of a sudden without telling me? What do you expect me to do?
Oh, I can imagine. I expect a proper explanation for all of this.
Who are you to call me loud?! I've got a right to be loud when I'm this angr...
What happened on the way here?
I don't have much, but I've at least got some basic medicine.
Chime grabs Marian's arm and slings it across her shoulder.
As Marian's arm grazes Chime's back, she winces.
I've got a killer migraine, that's what.
Are you sure you're not faking? You didn't experience any physical trauma.
Sure, but what about mental trauma?!
I gave her some herbs that are good for hangovers.
So, tell me how it went.
There were some small issues along the way, but nothing major.
There hasn't been a single Rapture attack.
Isn't that because of Rapunzel's hair?
Rapunzel's hair isn't fool-proof. It simply lowers the probability of an encounter.
It's been two whole weeks and we haven't encountered a single Rapture.
Do you think it's somehow related to that girl?
Got it. I'll keep that in mind.
I hope you've been in good health.
Hey, you ingrate! Her Highness is talking to you!
So, the girl is sleeping? It must have been a difficult trip for her.
I mean, I'm hungry, but my stomach doesn't growl that much.
Hehe, we're amongst friends, Your Highness.
Using our secret code names for the Raptures might prove to be a slight headache for our new arrival.
I believe we can safely refer to them as Tyrant-Class.
Oh, er... very well. My apologies, caution is simply in a Queen's nature.
At any rate, a Tyrant-Class Rapture is headed our way.
I'll take care of it as I'm leaving.
No. You take care of Marian.
Things might get chaotic when she wakes up.
Do you have any messages for her?
Tell her I'll be back for her, and to take care of herself in the meantime.
Don't worry, we'll take care of her.
First you take forever and a day to get here, and then you leave almost immediately!
Next time, I'll know better than to prepare anything when you say you'll be coming.
At least prepare me a meal.
Snow White hands three capsules to Crown.
If any black light starts emanating from Marian's body, use these.
They contain trace amounts of Vapaus, and will put any nanomachines out of commission.
It will prevent her from transforming.
Well then, shall we roll out the red carpet for our new citizen?
Nikkes may not have to eat in order to survive, but it can be a real boost for your mental health to do so.
If you just sit there and give us the silent treatment, there's nothing we can do to help you.
I'll leave this here. Make sure you eat it.
Chime leaves the plate of food and leaves the room.
She hasn't eaten anything or said a word for three days?
Yes. It must be hard for her to accept.
I'm sure being ousted from the Ark was traumatic for her, but thankfully she's got some friends in the Goddess Squad.
Be that as it may, the fact still stands that when she woke up, everyone was gone.
I'm sure she thinks she has been abandoned.
It's a tragic state of affairs, but time will solve it.
For the moment, our hands our tied. All we can do is wait for her to...
She even dares not to see the Queen when she pays her a visit.
Chime, starting from today, I don't want you paying Marian any more visits.
I shall treat her with the dignity that a Queen is capable of.
I would advise against that. You mustn't stoop so low as to appease her.
I said I would do it, and so I will.
Crown opens the door, enters, and brings over a chair to sit down.
The two women stare at each other blankly without exchanging any words.
They continue to do so until night has fallen,
at which point Crown stands up and leaves the room.
For the rest of the night, Crown listens to Marian crying behind the door.
Crown opens the door, enters, and brings over a chair to sit down.
Crown stands up and leaves the room
and listens to Marian crying from behind the door.
Crown sits opposite Marian, her usual wordless self.
Crown opens the door, enters, and brings over a chair to sit down.
My kind does not speak unless it is necessary.
I'm observing one of my subjects.
The moment you entered my kingdom, you became one of its citizens.
I know other people feel that way.
The Commander and the others... they all hate me.
I'm useless. All I do is drag people down.
In your current state, it is true that you're of no help to anyone.
But I will protect you nonetheless.
You're only doing that because you were ordered to.
It is a Queen's duty to protect her subjects,
and so that is precisely what I will do.
Since I'm not helpful in any way, I'll leave.
I'm going to see the Commander!
The way there is fraught with peril, and so I will protect you.
Did you get all that, Chime?
A voice rings out from behind the door.
The ground begins to shake, accompanied by the ringing of bells.
Out in the courtyard, a gleaming steel horse is standing.
Under the moonlight, Trombe gallops with mighty fury,
The moonlight and the wind part before them.
I knew we'd be going at a snail's pace with three riders.
Still, at our current speed, we should be there in 4 days or so.
A-are we really going to the Ark?
Isn't that where you said you wanted to go?
A Queen is dutybound to protect her subjects, and so we're accompanying you.
Everything! Not only will this put both of you in danger, but it'll also put the Commander in harm's way.
But I will protect you all the same.
Why? We've already made it this far.
Let's go back to the kingdom.
Trombe saunters slowly, carrying the three Nikkes on its back.
Across the dark plain, only the sound of clomping hooves fills the night air.
I guess there was no other way.
To be honest... I knew too.
It's just that... it was all so sad.
It felt like I was abandoned and all alone...
Don't you worry, Chime. I could never forget you.
You came here not of your own volition, brought by others, and yet you have formed such a strong bond with the Queen.
As part of this kingdom, you are one of its subjects,
and with that divine right comes certain responsibilities.
You may do whatever you wish,
Yes, but you must consider carefully whether
what you are doing is what you truly desire.
So great is the Queen's nobility, and so majestic her power,
that she can make any of your wishes reality.
Asking for the Queen's protection is not something that should be taken lightly.
So you must think very hard before you act.
Should you have a wish that you want to fulfill no matter the cost,
then you may speak with the Queen.
She will lend you her aid, and your wish will come true.
Do you understand what I'm telling you?
Then what is the wish of the Queen?
To protect her subjects. That is all.
My personal desires are of no importance.
A Queen exists because of and for her subjects.
What a hard way to live.
How many times must I tell you not to put those disgusting maggots on the table?!
They're way healthier than any processed or canned food, that's for sure.
What does that matter, you dolt? We're Nikkes!
Why don't you quit hitting the bottle before talking about nutrition?
Alcohol is the perfect cure for an ailing mind...
That sounds just like something a drunk would say.
Your Highness, must I endure such unwarranted criticism?
This woman has made my meal times a living hell.
Marian put a lot of thought into this meal.
Not you too, Your Highness! How can you be so cruel?
Hehe, thanks Crown. Don't forget to finish yours.
Er... I'm a bit full actually.
While we're on the subject of health, I noticed that you've seemed a bit tired these days, so I brewed some snake wine for you, Crown.
Such insolence! How dare you say Her Highness's name as if she was your friend?!
It's fine. It's nice being treated as an equal.
Hehe, you are most merciful, Crown.
Wait right here. I'll go get the snake wine.
Marian opens the door and heads out.
Don't you think Marian changed a bit after that day?
It must be the adolescence kicking in. During adolescence, people tend to change every day.
Chime glances around and then whispers softly.
You mean to say that she is growing, right?
Um... Yes, that's exactly what I meant.
I don't think this can explain...
I haven't been feeling well for the past few days.
What?! This won't do. You must rest at once.
I'll prepare a separate meal for you.
Crown gets up from her seat and heads into her room.
She isn't feeling well, so she's resting.
Yeah, she hasn't been looking all that great for a few days now.
Has something like this happened before?
She has a difficult time whenever there's a high concentration of Alva particles.
Is she sensitive to Alva particles?
Yes, but I can't tell you any more than that.
By the way, have you received any word from Snow White?
Are you still upset that she left without saying goodbye?
They're busy people, and they have lots of important things to do.
Despite all that, they still brought me all the way out here, so I'm very grateful to them.
Now that I realize what they did for me.
I'm curious what they'd think of you now as well.
Would you like to join me for a glass of snake wine?
I found a classic movie. It's called My Frisky Stepsister: Part 3. We can watch that while having a few drinks.
She looks beyond the castle gate outside the window,
She opens the door and heads out.
Marian? What are you doing at this hour?
Do you need to use the bathroom?
Wait just a sec. I'll go with you.
No, it's okay. I'm just having a hard time falling asleep.
I was going to take a short walk outside for a few minutes.
Okay. Just be careful, and don't venture outside the kingdom.
... Still unwell. This time it's lasting longer than I thought.
... I see. I hope she gets better soon.
Don't worry. Her Highness is strong.
Marian opens the door and heads out.
Marian walks outside the castle wall.
After walking for a while, she stops.
Beyond the horizon, figures can be seen.
Is the kingdom what they're after?
The castle walls are slowly losing their ability to conceal this place,
so more and more Raptures have been coming...
If they breach the walls, Crown and Chime won't be able to stop them.
Crown is sick now, and Chime is not a combat Nikke.
I can't allow you to come inside the kingdom.
I have to stop you here.
This is starting to wear me down...
Last one... I can do this!
It's okay. I can do it.
Maybe... I overdid it a little...
Trombe and Crown soar past Marian in a flash and jump up.
Crown fires off one shot and scores a direct hit on the Rapture's core.
Chime unloads a barrage of bullets which shatter the Rapture's sub-core.
The hulking Rapture collapses to the ground, defeated.
I'm supposed to be the one protecting you.
I can overcome anything if my subjects need protection
Of course, and I hope you hold me in equally high esteem.
You idiot! You should have told us something!
You even lied to my face!
You're laughing?! You think this is funny?!
When I saw those Raptures, I felt this power surge through me.
I felt an irrepressible urge to protect the kingdom, and all those in it.
Did you all feel the same way?
That is precisely what it means to protect someone you care about.
If you protect me, and I protect you,
there's no limit to how strong all of us can become.
No one has to get hurt.
It's so simple. I can't believe it took me so long to see it.
The more things you share with someone, the greater your resolve becomes.
A black light emits from Marian's body,
No, this isn't what you think it is...
and I will do the same.
While I was surveying the surroundings with a telescope, I saw a massive explosion.
Big enough to be seen from a distance.
It came from the direction of the Ark.
Are you planning on going there yourself?
I want to go with you, but that might only make things more dangerous.
Are you gonna be okay here on your own?
Do you have anything you want to say to him?
I have a feeling I might meet him.
When I listened to your stories, it seems like he's usually involved in most major events.
Am... Am I going to be killed?
The officials will arrive in an hour.
Has Mihara recovered from her injuries?
Please, let me see her... just once?
I've already told you, that's impossible.
You cannot meet anyone until your punishment is carried out.
Please... just one more time? Let me see her.
Only for a minute... just for a brief moment. Just let me see her face!
Many people lost their lives because of you.
They, too, had things they wished for.
People whom they wanted to see again.
Now they can no longer meet their loved ones.
So you don't get to meet with anyone either.
If you were smart, you would beg for forgiveness from the victims and await your punishment.
As Mana turns to leave, Yuni drops to her knees and grasps at Mana's legs.
I'm so sorry! So, so sorry!
*Sob sob sob* I-I'll atone for my sins for the rest of my life. I'll never stop begging for forgiveness.
Even if I don't get to see her,
No matter what happens to me, I won't challenge it.
Denounce me, curse me, beat and torture me.
I'll accept any punishment that's given to me, and I'll do whatever I'm told,
because I've sinned... I know this.
I've taken other people's loved ones away from them.
I'll spend the rest of my life begging for forgiveness, even if I have no hopes of ever receiving it.
Just please, let me say one thing to Mihara.
Yuni bows her head towards the floor,
and grasps at Mana's legs with sad desperation.
What is it that you want to say?
